FuncDef:
The domain-list command creates a domain list and then displays the domain list view.
The undo domain-list deletes an existing domain list.
By default, no domain list is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the domain list name.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-insensitive characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Before preventing users in a domain from accessing by using an interface, or enabling the users to access an interface, use thedomain-list command to create a domain list.
Before deleting or adding a domain, run the domain-list command to enter the domain list view.
Configuration Impact
The device can be configured with a maximum of 128 domain lists.
Precautions
A domain list cannot be deleted when being used.
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
